name: Pixel Defender (Totoj)
description:
An old project I developped before GetOutOfHell !

This is a Tower Defense game enhanced from a Brackey's tutorial where I added a mode where the map is randomly generate. And to add some more challenge, I started to add other features to make it harder like a random node destruction.

Features
  • Play Classic Mode to play with fixed map and unlock other turrets
  • Play Challenge Mode to play a randomly generated map every restart
Controls
  • Click on a node to open the build menu to buy a tower
  • Click on a node with tower to sell it or rotate it
  • You can move the camera with ZQSD and mouse wheel to zoom. Press space to set back to default view
